name: LGD Communications
tagline: We Speak Luxury in Every Language.
description:
More than a mere advertising agency (although we do that), LGD Communications is a Marketing Partner. In this capacity, LGD has earned its reputation for excellence with expertise gained over nearly three decades of presenting elevated lifestyle opportunities to prosperous consumers worldwide.
Under the leadership of President and Chief Creative Officer Len Dugow, our full-service, Miami-based agency has been instrumental in the marketing of more than 50 national and international luxury hotel and resort properties, and over $30 billion in high-end residential real estate around the globe. LGD is the only advertising agency in Miami that specializes in residential real estate development with the in-house capabilities to develop and evolve a message across all platforms â€“ from traditional print, broadcast, outdoor, media and collateral to digital advertising and social media in multiple languages. And because it all happens under one roof, collaboration and integration across all platforms happens organically, holistically and efficiently.
